Title: Yaakov Shwekey: Music strengthens souls in time of war
Description: Singer Yaakov Shwekey sits down on Real Talk with Hadassah Chen to discuss the songwriting process and the importance of music during this time of war.

Title: Watch: UAV from Lebanon intercepted after crossing into Israeli t...
Description: IDF publishes footage of Navy interception after UAV enters Israel's economic waters.

Title: Report: This is how Israeli intelligence infiltrated Hezbollah
Description: The Financial Times reports that Israel managed to collect extensive data during the Syrian civil war, and expanded those capabilities afterwards.

Title: Hamas commander in Lebanon eliminated in Israeli strike, terror g...
Description: Fatah Sharif Abu al-Amin, senior UNRWA employee and senior Hamas official, killed in strike in Lebanon.

Title: IDF strikes Lebanon and Yemen simultaneously
Description: IDF strikes Hezbollah commanders in Beirut and Houthi targets in Yemen. Commander of Hezbollah chemical unit reportedly targeted.

Title: The custom of reciting Selichot
Description: Selichot is a custom that the Jewish people began to practice during the Geonic period, more than a thousand years ago * By the end of the Rishonim period, the custom was established in Sephardic communities to recite Selichot throughout the month of Elul and the Ten Days of Repentance * In Ashkenaz, the custom is to start reciting Selichot on the Saturday night before Rosh Hashanah.

Title: In Depth: Arabs against oppression
Description: Prime Minister Netanyahu recently addressed those suffering under oppressive regimes in the Middle East. Who was he talking to?

Title: A Kafkaesque time for the Jewish people
Description: What is happening to Jews worldwide is also happening 'down under' in the land once seen as a place of billabongs and swagmen where antisemitism does not exist. Op-ed.

Title: Jewish professor: Muhlenberg College fired me for anti-Israel pos...
Description: Professor accused of harassing pro-Israel students online is fired from Muhlenberg College; Association for American University Professors promises to investigate.

Title: In Lebanon, it is the United States that must cease-fire
Description: Amos Hochstein never lets failure get in his way. The negotiator who brought us the Lebanon-Israel Maritime Accords, a boon for Hezbollah, now wants to prevent Israel from achieving victory. Israel does not need his interference. Opinion.

Title: Urgent Call: Rabbi Yair Bar Rav seeks Tallitot and Machzorim Dona...
Description: Emergency deployment to the northern norder: Rabbi Yair Bar Rav Calls for urgent donations of Tallitot and Machzorim for soldiers.

Title: Watch: Iranian anchors break down while reporting Nasrallah's dea...
Description: MEMRI published footage showing two personalities from Iranâ€™s Press TV breaking down while reporting on death of Hezbollah leader. One of them says she would have sacrificed her children to bring Nasrallah back.

Title: The first time since the start of the war | Poll: Right-wing bloc...
Description: Channel 14 poll shows that if elections were to be held today, the Likud led by Netanyahu would win 31 seats.

Title: Pompeo: US should encourage Israel to finish the job
Description: Former US Secretary of State says it is a mistake for the United States to push for a ceasefire between Israel and Hamas.

Title: After Nasrallah elimination: US military boosts air support, incr...
Description: Pentagon warns Iran against escalating the current conflict: The United States will take every necessary measure to defend our people.

Title: Abbas sends condolences following elimination of Nasrallah
Description: PA chairman's spokesperson warns that the entire region is entering a new and dangerous period of instability.

Title: Report: Israel likely used US-made bombs in Nasrallah strike
Description: Washington Post reports that Israel likely used US-made 2,000-pound bombs in its strike that killed Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah.

Title: Elimination in Beirut: Three senior PFLP terrorists killed in exp...
Description: Media in Lebanon report explosion in the Al-Kola district of the Lebanese capital. The Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine: Three of our senior leaders were killed in an Israeli attack.

Title: IDF strikes dozens of Hezbollah terror targets deep in Lebanese t...
Description: IAF fighter jets strike dozens of launchers and buildings where weapons belonging to Hezbollah were stored in the Beqaa area.

Title: Report: Hezbollah appoints replacement for Nasrallah
Description: Hashem Safieddine, the head of Hezbollah's Executive Council, was chosen by the organization's Shura Council, on which he serves as well, to replace Hassan Nasrallah as Secretary General.

Title: Biden: I will speak with Netanyahu, an all-out war must be avoide...
Description: US President tells reporters he will speak with Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and stresses the importance of an all-out war in the Middle East being avoided.
